item.title: Display image after Data Augmentation with Pytorch
item.description: ##background **I want to display the image after data augmentation! ** I decided to implement it. Data Augmentation is a technology to inflate one image, and the following operations are added. Random Crop Random Horizontal Flip (the image is horizontally flipped with a certain probability) Random Erasing (randomly add noise to a part of the image) Random Affine (scales images randomly) There are many other things. ##Implementation
